step_feedback.feedback: Good start! Try to bring your shoulder blades back and down a bit more smoothly in the circular motion.
You're doing well with the circular motion. Focus on keeping the movement controlled and gentle, especially as you bring your shoulders forward.
Great job completing the repetitions! Remember to inhale deeply as you pull your shoulders back to maximize the benefit.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the shoulder rolls! Keep focusing on smooth, circular movements and remember to breathe deeply when pulling your shoulders back. This helps with mobility and lymphatic flow.
